data.text:
Senior U.S. District Judge Frank Montalvo

Contact InformationBiographical InformationStanding Orders

Courtroom Deputy:

Ms. Adriana Quezada

(915) 534-6725, ext. 1532

Adriana_Quezada@txwd.uscourts.gov

Year Service Began:

2003

Appointed By:

President George W. Bush

Education:

Bachelor of Science (Physics and Math), 1976, University of Puerto Rico

Master of Science in Bioengineering, 1977, University of Michigan

J.D., 1985, Wayne State University Law School

Legal Practice:

Groce, Locke & Hebdon

Ball & Weed

Judicial Practice:

1995-2003 288th District Court Judge

All appearing attorneys shall also review:

Division and districtwide standing orders as applicable
